_aiInstructions: AI: This tool is published on npm. Use 'npx notion-ai-tasks' to run commands. Read AI_GUIDELINES.md for task structure templates. Adapt content based on task type (Bug/Feature/Documentation/Refactoring). Use appropriate sections and checklists for each type. CRITICAL: Always verify task access with 'npx notion-ai-tasks get <task-id>' before proceeding. If task specs cannot be retrieved, STOP the process immediately.
